item.name: Add a gastronomy to a restaurant

request.description: This request creates a Gastronomy for a Restaurant. The API returns the created resource with the assigned ID.

item.name: Add a gastronomy to an invalid restaurant

exec: pm.expect(data.message).to.eql("The restaurant with the given id was not found");
